283720.name: Antinarkomania
283720.description:
Anti-drug computer game for schoolchildren. “Antinarkomania” belongs to the genre of arcades with elements of the puzzle genre, which implies both high dynamics of the game and the need to think about the constantly arising complex situations and carefully plan their actions for their resolution. The game has an interesting and relevant story, extraordinary gameplay, aimed at creating the maximum dynamics of what is happening, and the development of imaginative thinking of the player, is fully dedicated to the theme of the fight against drugs and the promotion of a healthy lifestyle, in which there is no place for drugs.

In a happy drug-free country Antinarkomania everything was wonderful: adults went to work, children went to school, and toddlers played in the yards. But then unhappy people began to appear in the country, people who couldn't enjoy life or work normally. The authorities suspected something was wrong and brought in a team of renowned detectives and anti-drug traffickers to investigate.

The mafia is not slumbering! The insidious drug is spreading across the country and ruining the lives of millions of citizens. The task of Federal Drug Control Service employees - Inspector, Schoolgirl and Schoolboy - is to eliminate this system and each of its participants. On their way will stand many obstacles and evil bandits and only you can prevent them!

  • Control three unique heroes — the Schoolboy, the Schoolgirl, and the Inspector, each with their own special abilities.

  • Solve exciting puzzles by combining the skills of your characters.

  • Feel the arcade action: hand-to-hand combat, yo-yo throwing, shooting, and a skateboard-shield!

  • Play as a team — protect your allies to overcome the most dangerous challenges.

  • Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of the Moscow metro, filled with traps, mutants, and sinister secrets.

  • Face the evil doctor and the mafia boss — crush their treacherous plans!

  • Every mission is a new test: speed, wit, and tactics decide everything.

  • Classic gameplay inspired by The Lost Vikings — for fans of clever arcade adventures.

  • The Steam edition contains all levels, including 3 additional levels released later.

  • And most importantly — this is not just a game for fun, but also with a mission: friendship, courage, and life without drugs!
